TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ECDiffieHellmanOpenSsl extends System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellman
Public NotInheritable Class ECDiffieHellmanOpenSsl Inherits ECDiffieHellman

summary.span: 提供由 OpenSSL 支持的椭圆曲线 Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) 算法的实现。

span.span: Provides an implementation of the Elliptic Curve Diffie-Hellman (ECDH) algorithm backed by OpenSSL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当使用系统 OpenSSL 库执行平台互操作时，才应直接使用此类。This class should only be used directly when doing platform interop with the system OpenSSL library. 当不需要平台互操作时，应使用 工厂方法而不是特定的派生实现。When platform interop is not needed, you should use the factory methods instead of a specific derived implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 使用 NIST P-521/secp521r1 的默认曲线初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a default curve of NIST P-521/secp521r1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/私有密钥对，它只会设置在需要时用于生成密钥的大小。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately, it just sets the size which will be used to generate a key when one is needed. 如果通过 方法或其他密钥导入方法加载密钥，则此构造函数的密钥大小没有意义。If key is loaded via the method, or other key import method, the key size from this constructor has no meaning.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 keySize) cil managed

param.name: keySize
param.span: 需要密钥时，要生成的密钥的大小。

span.span: The size of the key to generate, when a key is needed.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，该类默认为指定大小的 NIST 主曲线。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class defaulting to the NIST prime curve of the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数仅支持三个密钥大小： 256 (NIST P-256/secp256r1) 、384 (NIST P-384/secp384r1) 和 521 (NIST P-521/secp521r1) 。Only three key sizes are supported by this constructor: 256 (NIST P-256/secp256r1), 384 (NIST P-384/secp384r1), and 521 (NIST P-521/secp521r1). 若要为任何其他曲线生成密钥，请使用 构造函数或 方法。To generate keys For any other curve, use the constructor or the method. 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/私有密钥对，它只会设置在需要时用于生成密钥的大小。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately, it just sets the size which will be used to generate a key when one is needed. 如果通过 方法或其他密钥导入方法加载密钥，则此构造函数的密钥大小没有意义。If key is loaded via the method, or other key import method, the key size from this constructor has no meaning.

span.span: The value is not supported by this implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(native int handle) cil managed

param.name: handle
param.span: 用作密钥的 OpenSSL EC_KEY\* 值。

span.span: The OpenSSL EC_KEY\* value to use as the key.

summary.span: 根据表示为 EC_KEY\* 的现有 OpenSSL 密钥初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class from an existing OpenSSL key represented as an EC_KEY\*.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > OpenSSL 支持在同一个进程中加载多个库版本。OpenSSL supports multiple library versions being loaded within the same process. 在调用此构造函数之前，验证指针值是否来自此类使用的 OpenSSL 版本。Before calling this constructor, verify your pointer value came from the same version of OpenSSL that this class uses. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

span.span: is .
is not a valid EC_KEY\*.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and generates a new key on the specified curve.
does not validate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > OpenSSL 支持在同一个进程中加载多个库版本。OpenSSL supports multiple library versions being loaded within the same process. 在调用此构造函数之前，验证指针值是否来自此类使用的 OpenSSL 版本。Before calling this constructor, verify your pointer value came from the same version of OpenSSL that this class uses. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] DeriveKeyFromHash (System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey otherPartyPublicKey, System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm, byte[] secretPrepend, byte[] secretAppend);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance unsigned int8[] DeriveKeyFromHash(class System.Security.Cryptography.ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey otherPartyPublicKey, valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm, unsigned int8[] secretPrepend, unsigned int8[] secretAppend) cil managed
Public Overrides Function DeriveKeyFromHash (otherPartyPublicKey As ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey, hashAlgorithm As HashAlgorithmName, secretPrepend As Byte(), secretAppend As Byte()) As Byte()

public: override cli::array <System::Byte> ^ DeriveKeyFromHash(System::Security::Cryptography::ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey ^ otherPartyPublicKey, System::Security::Cryptography::HashAlgorithmName hashAlgorithm, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ secretPrepend, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ secretAppend);

param.name: otherPartyPublicKey
param.span: 另一方的公钥。

span.span: The other party's public key.

param.name: hashAlgorithm
param.span: 用于派生密钥材料的哈希算法。

span.span: The hash algorithm to use to derive the key material.

param.name: secretPrepend
param.span: 在进行哈希算法之前，要预置到派生密钥前面的值。

span.span: A value to prepend to the derived secret before hashing.

param.name: secretAppend
param.span: 在进行哈希算法之前，要追加到派生密钥的值。

span.span: A value to append to the derived secret before hashing.

summary.span: 使用指定的哈希算法对可选的添加数据或追加数据执行密钥派生。

span.span: Performs key derivation using a specified hash algorithm with optional prepended or appended data.

returns.span: 按需添加数据或追加数据之后的共享机密的哈希值。

span.span: The hash of the shared secret after prepending or appending data as requested.

exception.span: 使用的曲线的大小与此密钥使用的曲线不同。

span.span: The curve used by has a different size than the curve from this key.
-or-
The parameter does not specify a hash.
is .

exception.span: 使用的曲线与此密钥使用的曲线不同。

span.span: The curve used by is different than the curve from this key.
-or-

exception.span: 此实例仅表示一个公钥。

span.span: This instance represents only a public key.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Security.Cryptography.SafeEvpPKeyHandle DuplicateKeyHandle() cil managed

summary.span: 获取加密密钥的 表示形式。

span.span: Gets a representation of the cryptographic key.

returns.span: 加密密钥的 表示形式。

span.span: A representation of the cryptographic key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对此方法的每个调用都会产生一个新的 对象，该对象具有自己的生存期。Each call to this method produces a new object with its own lifetime. 此方法返回的对象可以安全地使用，即使在此 实例被释放后也是如此。The objects returned by this method can safely be used even after this instance has been disposed.

summary.span: 使用显式曲线形式将公钥或公钥和私钥信息从当前密钥导出到 结构，以便可以将其传递给 方法。

span.span: Exports either the public or the public and private key information using the explicit curve form from the current key to an structure so that it can be passed to the method.

returns.span: 表示此项在曲线上的点的对象（使用显式曲线格式）。

span.span: An object that represents the point on the curve for this key, using the explicit curve format.

exception.span: 此方法无法获取曲线值。

span.span: The method cannot obtain curve values.

summary.span: 将 对象使用的密钥导出到 对象。

span.span: Exports the key used by the object into an object.

returns.span: 对象使用的密钥和已命名曲线参数。

span.span: The key and named curve parameters used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果该密钥是作为命名曲线创建的，则该 字段包含已命名的曲线参数; 否则，它将包含显式参数。If the key was created as a named curve, the field contains named curve parameters; otherwise, it contains explicit parameters.

exception.span: 此方法无法获取曲线值。

span.span: The method cannot obtain curve values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void GenerateKey(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.ECCurve curve) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub GenerateKey (curve As ECCurve)

param.name: curve
param.span: 用于生成临时公钥/私钥对的曲线。

span.span: The curve used to generate an ephemeral public/private key pair.

summary.span: 为指定曲线生成新的临时公钥/私钥对。

span.span: Generates a new ephemeral public/private key pair for the specified curve.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `curve` 必须验证 (也就是说，它在传递给方法时必须返回 true ) 并且不得为隐式。`curve` must validate (that is, it must return true when passed to the method) and must not be implicit.

span.span: does not validate.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void ImportParameters(valuetype System.Security.Cryptography.ECParameters parameters) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub ImportParameters (parameters As ECParameters)

param.name: parameters
param.span: 要导入的曲线参数。

span.span: The curve's parameters to import.

summary.span: 将 对象的指定参数作为密钥导入当前实例。

span.span: Imports the specified parameters for an object as a key into the current instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法通过创建新的对象来替换此对象正在使用的现有密钥 。The method replaces the existing key that this object is working with by creating a new object. 如果 `parameters` 仅包含 字段，则只导入公钥。If `parameters` contains only the field, then only a public key is imported. 如果 `parameters` 还包含 ，则将导入完整密钥对。If `parameters` also contains , then a full key pair is be imported. `parameter` 值指定要导入的曲线类型。The `parameter` value specifies the type of the curve to import.

span.span: does not validate.

exception.span: 引用无法导入的一条曲线。

span.span: references a curve that cannot be imported.

exception.span: 引用此平台不支持的一条曲线。

span.span: references a curve that is not supported by this platform.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property PublicKey As ECDiffieHellmanPublicKey

summary.span: 获取另一个 对象可用来生成共享机密协议的公钥。

span.span: Gets the public key that can be used by another object to generate a shared secret agreement.

value.span: 与 对象的此实例关联的公钥。

span.span: The public key that is associated with this instance of the object.
